sources.title: THE ENGAGEMENT RING (1912)
sources.description: THE ENGAGEMENT RING Biograph Company, 497 ft., rel. Mar. 11, 1912 dir. Mack Sennett, auth. Mabel Normand, cam. Percy Higginson cast: Mabel Normand, Eddie Dillon, Del Henderson, Kate Bruce, Fred Mace, J. Jiquel Lanoe, Wm. J. Butler, Charles H. West, Harry Hyde, William Beaudine filmed: 1/1912 Location: CA copyright: Mar. 11, 1912

metadata.Plot: Alice has two persistent suitors, one rich, one poor. Each buys her an engagement ring; the rich man pays cash, but the poor man must pay on installments. He has trouble making the payments, but then he's injured in an auto accident and the settlement allows him to pay off the ring and propose to Alice.
metadata.Actors: Mabel Normand, Edward Dillon, Dell Henderson
